scripts.test:chrome: npm run build && karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless karma.conf.js
scripts.test:chromeHeaded: npm run build && karma start --browsers Chrome karma.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build && karma start --single-run --browsers FirefoxHeadless karma.conf.js
scripts.test:edge: npm run build && karma start --single-run --browsers Edge karma.conf.js
scripts.test:safari: npm run build && karma start --single-run --browsers Safari karma.conf.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run build && karma watch --browsers Chrome karma.conf.js
